entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:23 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:23 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 8:23 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
